scheduled_maintenances.name: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - Multiple hosts migration notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer, affecting hosts in racks 31A04, 31A05, 31A06 and 31A07. Start time : 20/02/2026 21:00 UTC End time : 21/02/2026 06:00 UTC Service impact : Hosts located in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for 8 hours maximum. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will migrate Hosted Private Cloud hosts in the specified racks from RBX2 datacenter to RBX7 datacenter. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in RBX2D region. Start time : 23/02/2026 07:30 UTC End time : 23/02/2026 22:00 UTC Service impact : There will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability, or virtual machines during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer. Start time : 23/02/2026 08:00 UTC End time : 26/02/2026 17:00 UTC Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation. If the host has virtual machines in it, a vMotion will be performed. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer. An individual communication will be done to inform customers. Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager. Thank you for your understanding

scheduled_maintenances.name: [EU/CA][Backup as a Service] - Zerto maintenance notification

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Backup as a Service offer. Start time : 23/02/2026 08:00 UTC End time : 26/02/2026 17:00 UTC Service impact : During the maintenance window, the synchronization between the primary and secondary sites will be interrupted. As a result, the customer will not be able to activate the Disaster Recovery service. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Backup as a Service offer. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in RBX2D region. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in SBG1A region.
